title: Digimon: Data Squad
resume: Masaru, is a second year Junior High student, and is undefeated in  battle, He meets the Digital Monster Agumon, who has escaped from DATS,  a secret government organization. Despite terrible first impressions,  the two become best friends by talking with their "fists". With others,  Masaru and Agumon work to investigate various incidents involving the  Digital World and Digital Monsters, to try and get to the bottom of  things.
